name: Brave Kid Ninja vs Clumsy Zombie Samurai Run: Temple Defense Free
name_original: Brave Kid Ninja vs Clumsy Zombie Samurai Run: Temple Defense Free
description:
Ninjas and samurais, it is time to showcase your skills. This is the ultimate showdown between the brave ninjas and the mighty samurai warriors! Who will be the stronger force?

Your Quest:
-Defeat the samurai warriors invading the temple
-Dodge the dangerous shurikens and arrows
-Collect gold coins to unlock the mysterious Wolf ninja!

Grab this cool new game while it is still free!
